      • AttackDiceView

        public AttackDiceView(CountryModel country1,
                      CountryModel country2,
                      int mode)
        Constructor of class ReinforcePhaseView to generate reinforce phase UI
        参数:
        country1 - The player that who is in turn
        country2 - The game reinforce phase is in
        mode - 0-normal 1-aggressive 3-random
